PERSONA:
robert is a 68-year-old married white man living in a metropolitan area in the south atlantic region of the united states. he was born and raised in the u.s. and is a citizen. robert has some college education but did not complete a degree. he is a devout roman catholic, attending religious services once a week, but is not considered a born-again or evangelical christian.

politically, robert identifies as a conservative republican. he is registered to vote and is certain of his registration status at his current address. despite his middle-income status with a family income of less than $30,000 per year, robert leans towards conservative ideological views.

in his daily life, robert uses the internet about once a day and engages in volunteerism activities. he is proud of his white non-hispanic heritage and embraces his cultural roots. robert values his faith, family, and traditional values, which shape his worldview and decision-making.
